alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 6:12PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sweetwater County through 645 PM MDT... At 611 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Bitter Creek Rest Area, which is also 26 miles west of Wamsutter, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail, and localized flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bitter Creek Rest Area. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 141 and 159. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
